statements: SELECT * FROM financial_sentiment_analysis ORDER BY report_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_text FROM financial_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT report_id, report_text, sentiment_score FROM financial_sentiment_analysis WHERE report_id = 1
SELECT * FROM financial_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0 ORDER BY report_id ASC
SELECT report_id, sentiment_score FROM financial_sentiment_analysis
SELECT * FROM financial_sentiment_analysis WHERE report_id > 100 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT report_text, sentiment_score FROM financial_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.0 LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM financial_sentiment_analysis WHERE report_id BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT report_text FROM financial_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score >= 0.5 ORDER BY report_id ASC
SELECT report_id, report_text, sentiment_score FROM financial_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN -1.0 AND 1.0 ORDER BY report_id
SELECT * FROM FinancialReports;
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM FinancialReports WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT report_text, report_id FROM FinancialReports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT sentiment_id, report_id, sentiment_score FROM MarketSentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM MarketSentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, sentiment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialReports;
SELECT report_text FROM FinancialReports WHERE report_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM FinancialReports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT sentiment_id, report_id, sentiment_score FROM MarketSentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC;
SELECT FinancialReports.report_id, MarketSentiment.sentiment_score FROM FinancialReports JOIN MarketSentiment ON FinancialReports.report_id = MarketSentiment.report_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports;
SELECT company_name, report_date FROM financial_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, company_name, report_content FROM financial_reports WHERE company_name = 'Example Company';
SELECT sentiment_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM market_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT sentiment_category, report_id FROM market_sentiment JOIN financial_reports ON market_sentiment.report_id = financial_reports.report_id ORDER BY sentiment_category ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT company_name, report_date FROM financial_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM market_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT company_name, report_content FROM financial_reports JOIN market_sentiment ON financial_reports.report_id = market_sentiment.report_id ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM financial_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_text, sentiment_score FROM financial_reports JOIN sentiment_scores ON financial_reports.report_id = sentiment_scores.report_id;
SELECT report_id, market_id, sentiment_label FROM report_sentiment ORDER BY market_id, sentiment_label;
SELECT report_text FROM financial_reports WHERE report_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports;
SELECT report_text FROM financial_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT sentiment_label, sentiment_score FROM report_sentiment JOIN sentiment_scores ON report_sentiment.report_id = sentiment_scores.report_id;
SELECT market_sentiment FROM market_sentiment WHERE market_id = 3;
SELECT report_text, sentiment_label FROM financial_reports JOIN report_sentiment ON financial_reports.report_id = report_sentiment.report_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT company_name, industry_sector FROM company_info WHERE industry_sector = 'Technology';
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_text FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) as avg_score, market_sentiment FROM sentiment_scores INNER JOIN market_sentiment ON sentiment_scores.report_id = market_sentiment.sentiment_id GROUP BY market_sentiment;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_text FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, industry_sector FROM company_info WHERE industry_sector = 'Technology' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT market_sentiment, sentiment_date FROM market_sentiment ORDER BY sentiment_date ASC;
